title: Xin Zhao - BUGGED
body:
Hi Riot,

I Have found a bug on Xin Zhao after the newest update. His Q is bugged and about 90% of the time his Q doesn't knockup the enemies. I played him twice in ranked where I found it out and lost the 2 games because of it as it is very useful such as for Yasuo's ULT. Not sure how I get this directly to riot so they can start fixing it.

replies.body: Have you added this to the 5.3 bugs megathread at the top of the boards?
Yeah a lot of people have noticed this with Xin. I suggest not playing him for a while :P

my xin also complained about it too in a rank game

been a bug for a while now
